Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class GuiImagesMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.GuiImagesMap
  • public class GuiImagesMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton of a map that contains all the requested images since that moment. It's fundamental to ask the images through this class so that the class can load it only the first time and than reuse it at need.

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getImage​(java.lang.String imgPath)
        Return the image at the path requested. The root path where this method look for the image is '/images/' inside the resources folder. It caches the image too.
        Parameters:
        imgPath - the path of the requested image
        Returns:
        Image the image requested

      • getImageWithShadow

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getImageWithShadow​(java.lang.String imgPath,
                                                          double w,
                                                          double h)
        Return the image at the path requested. The root path where this method look for the image is '/images/' inside the resources folder. It caches the image too.
        Parameters:
        imgPath - the path of the requested image
        w - width
        h - height
        Returns:
        Image the image requested
